comments.author: MFahad
comments.body: You have a cool-looking website. The name on the other hand sounds pretty weird. No offense but when we hear ChicksX it sounds like a porn related website . but anyway.Â  your website is good with neat layout. I wish I could test the features by doing some trades. but not able to do that right now.I suggest you to run some promotional campaigns like Signature campaign etc to better spread awareness of your exchange.

comments.author: Suman1
comments.body: Interesting, this platform support multiple payment methods including Skrill, PayPal. However been using major exchanges like Bitget, Kucoin and OKX hope we can have a better alternative that can compete with them Eager to see how they can build trust and confidence in this industry.

However been using major exchanges like Bitget, Kucoin and OKX hope we can have a better alternative that can compete with them Eager to see how they can build trust and confidence in this industry. comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: ChicksX on June 13, 2024, 04:31:16 AMBuy and sell crypto on ChicksX. We're fully licenced and available 24/7!Very nice website/decentralized exchange look alike. But it has limited trading countries. I was looking for my country currency ðŸ’µ to Carry out a trade but I saw only USD and other Europe Currencies. And it will be nice you add other African countries so we can also participate in the exchange platform. The platform nis vet easy to understand and navigate. As you said, cryptocurrency market is very large so you have to expand the trading to a wider range so more people can participate in it.
